doc.title: Mensajero del Sur
doc.plot: During the Afrobasket celebration, Pau Gasol, the NBA player for Lakers travels up to Angola like Good Will Ambassador of UNICEF and meet Ezio a young Angolan. "Mensajero del Sur"- "Messenger from the south" is the meeting of two worlds where the struggle for the overcoming of Ezio, a young Angolan, and the commitment of Pau Gasol become great allied to conquer the problems that hurry up the people of Angola: The AIDS, the absence of education, the scarcity of infantile attention centres, etc.
